description:
Tanmoku Ki is finally freed from his nightmare thanks to Keika, but he seems locked in a depression that he cannot shake. As the day of the ceremony dawns, Ki has no choice but to force himself to see the service through despite his ill health. But as the ceremony progresses Ki`s health visibly takes a turn for the worse and Keika intercedes to help him, despite the fact that it is against the rules to do so.
Source: crunchyroll
